title: Foundry Gridnik pairs well with which sans serif???
content:
I'm looking for a good sans serif to pair up with Foundry Gridnik.

Let's say in a Annual Report -Gridnik was my primary font (titles, headlines, large body copy), what would be a good sans serif match for the financials and call-outs?

Any ideas?

thanks in advance.

-J

Freight Sans? shares a similarly high x height
Cholla Wide from Emigre or FF DIN, which has the most variety.

Foundry Monoline is based in its proportions on Foundry Gridnik,  
so probably it's worth to have a closer look at it.
